featured.title: CHIP-8 Emulator
featured.description: A CHIP-8 interpreter written in rust, emulating the original COSMAC VIP interpreter. Includes an elementary assembler in python, to create ROMs from plaintext hex, and example ROMS such as space invaders or snake.

featured.title: sci-calc
featured.description: An easy to use, fully functional scientific calculator library and CLI. Uses syntax parsing for robust and elegant error handling. Also features comprehensive built-in functions, variable recall, and more.

featured.title: Docker Dash
featured.description: Docker Dash is a basic GUI dashboard made for administrators to manage user apps running as docker containers on a server. I worked the backend while interning at the Applied Research Laboratory at Univeristy of Hawai'i

other.title: Word Searcher
other.description: Brute force word search solver, made with Python
